item.title: Writing my first EIP
item.description: Suberra is a web3 payment gateway specialising in subscription payments. One of the key requirement of subscriptions is pulling funds from users’ at recurring intervals. In midst of designing a secure solution, we decided a generalised standard can come in useful for others. Our EIP extends ERC-20 to add an auto-renewable allowance so that funds can be spent over time. Draft Submission & Discussion #One of the prerequisite of an EIP is having open discourse.
